description: A React component that handles OAuth callback from Jira, displaying authorization status and redirecting the user accordingly.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Wraps the OAuth callback handling component in a Suspense boundary, providing fallback UI during loading.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Handles OAuth callback logic: checks URL params for errors, updates state, and redirects after a delay.
